New Group bụ otu ndị na-eto eto na-ese ihe na South Africa bụ ndị, malite na 1937, malitere ịjụ ajụjụ ma na-emegide nchedo nke South African Society of Artists
Onye isi oche ya bụ Gregoire Boonzaier; ndị ọzọ guzobere ya bụ Lippy Lipshitz, Frieda Lock, Cecil Higgs na Terence McCaw.

New Group bụ ndị na-ese ihe na South Africa nke oge a ndị na-arụkọ ọrụ ma gosipụta ihe ngosi dika otu, nke gụnyere Judith Gluckman na Alexis Preller yana Lippy Lipschitz, Gregoire Boonzaier (onye guzobere na onye isi oche ruo afọ iri), Louis Maurice, Solly Disner na Walter Battiss.
